alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 7:51PM CDT until June 04 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Wahpeton affecting Wilkin and Richland Counties. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Marshall, Kittson, Walsh and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River AT Alvarado. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 106.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. Storm sewer flood gates are closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 105.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 106.3 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 106.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
